kids_ggl¶

The KiDS Galaxy-Galaxy Lensing pipeline

kids_ggl works with the KiDS lensing catalog to calculate the lensing signal around a user-specified lens sample, including the covariance matrix, and fit a flexible halo model. It also provides some functionality as a python module as kids_ggl_pipeline.

kids_ggl is compatible with Python 3 as of version 1.6.2.
